piggyback.config.cancel.tooltip: Exit Config Screen without saving any changes.
piggyback.config.default.tooltip: Reset this field to it's default value.
piggyback.config.disable_ride_function.t: - Disable the ability right-click a crouching player with an empty hand to hop on their back.
piggyback.config.effect_translucent.tool: - Apply translucent effect to rider's player model in 1st person view.
piggyback.config.effect_translucent_carr: - Apply translucent effect to carrier's player model in 1st person view.
piggyback.config.falling_dismount.toolti:
- Dismount on falling from high place.
- Can be avoided by crouching.
piggyback.config.hunger_carry.tooltip:
- Carrier got hunger while carrying other player.
- Loses 1 saturation pointer per 40 seconds.
piggyback.config.require_restart: âš  This feature requires restarting the game to apply the changes.
piggyback.config.reset.tooltip: Reset all options to their default, can be undo.
piggyback.config.slow_carry.tooltip: - Carrier got a slow debuff while carrying other player.
piggyback.config.title: Diversity's Configs
piggyback.config.undo.tooltip: Revert all options to their pre-edit state.
